Summary: The first flew right over my house it was a dull grey black but transparent to it had small orange lights all over it mad no sound at all. The second one Appered minutes after it was a smaller transparent ship with grey blue lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Arkadelphia
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfiend and I were in our front yard just back from a walk Round the neiborhood. It was a very cold clear night so naturally I was gazing at the stars. It was between 11:48 and 12:00 when the first craft silently glided right over my house a little higher than the trees. It was a dull solid like transparent triangle about the size of a small jet covered In small orange lights. As I began to freak out my girlfriend thought I was losing but less than 2 min later the second one a little farther out and higher flew over. She caught a glimpse of it before it went out of sight in the tree line. It was a smaller triangle transparent craft just like the other but the lights were aranged in a different pattern. Larger and less of them more of a dull grey blue.
